Hi @IqraSA thank you for opening the issue. 
Are you following an installation guide? or is there a reason you want version 8?
If you are looking to install the latest version we have, then you can use 
`npm install -g truffle`

or if you can use
`npm show truffle version` 
to find the latest version available

Hey!

Yes I am following the installation tutorial and I did use  npm install -g
truffle

As well but it did work there are still these same warning appearing.


Do you think is there any issue with installing npm?

Best,
Iqra Sadia

Hi Iqra,

You should be good to go if you are able to get a version of truffle as @lsqproduction mentioned. The warnings are to let you know that some npm packaged are deprecated.
Closing this issue; the warnings don't prevent installation, and we're already tracking the issue of warnings on #3986.

Ok thank you!
